plot: After watching the heavens in search of his father, a young boy builds a transmitter capable of sending a message into space. Evil aliens intercept the message and subsequently threaten the existence of mankind.
title: Sam and the Green Men
plot_es: After watching the heavens in search of his father, a young boy builds a transmitter capable of sending a message into space. Evil aliens intercept the message and subsequently threaten the existence of mankind.
plot_en: After watching the heavens in search of his father, a young boy builds a transmitter capable of sending a message into space. Evil aliens intercept the message and subsequently threaten the existence of mankind.
